active_skill.name: Drylands Shark Hunt
active_skill.description:
Plants a homing trap underfoot which bites, tears, and summons torpedos at triggering enemies, dealing Ice DMG and accumulating Ice Anomaly Buildup.

DMG Multiplier:
192%+384%/204.8%+409.6%/217.6%+435.2%/230.4%+460.8%/243.2%+486.4%

Daze Multiplier: 
70%+140%/74.6%+149.3%/79.3%+158.6%/84%+168%/88.6%+177.3%

Cooldown 12s

additional_ability.name: Cold Surge
additional_ability.description: When there are 2 or more Ice Attribute characters in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack inflicts 100%/125%/150%/175%/200% more Anomaly Buildup.

chain_attack.name: Relentless Pursuit
chain_attack.description:
Summons a homing trap and leaps toward the target, causing an explosion upon landing that deals Ice DMG and accumulates massive Ice Anomaly Buildup.

DMG Multiplier:
691%/737%/783%/829%/875%

Daze Multiplier: 
139%/148%/158%/167%/176%
